Name: Xtreme Typing
About the game: This fast-moving, action game will keep your fingers on the keyboard as you move your motorcycle across the desert and through the heart of the city. Type accurately and faster than your target words per minute and watch a motorcycle stunt fest! Your bike will make several jumps, fly off ramps, roll over limousines, and fly over buses. See if you can accelerate your bike through each level of the course and get to the finish line. If you type fast and accurately, you will see a grand finale stunt at the end of the course.
